info.description:
Easemob Server REST API Swagger is designated to provide better documentation and thorough interfaces for testing. For more details about server implementation, request rate limitation, etc, please visit [Easemob Server Integration](http://docs.easemob.com/im/100serverintegration/10intro).  

**Note:**

`org_ID` is the unique ID of the organization created when you first registered [Easemob console](https://console.easemob.com/).                         
`app_name` is the unique app ID created when you new application in [Easemob console](https://console.easemob.com/).           
`Authorization token` is required for most API requests as part of requesting header in the format `Bearer ${token}`. You can obtain the token via [/{org_name}/{app_name}/token](http://docs.easemob.com/im/100serverintegration/20users).
info.title: Easemob REST APIs

post.description:
Warning: File cannot be over 10MB, otherwise will fail.
Important: Be sure keep the "uuid" and "share-secret", which are requirement when downloading particular file.

parameters.name: restrict-access
parameters.description: "restrict-access" determines whether later the file require "share-secret" for access or allow public access.

401.description: unauthorized [without token, token error, token expired]

get.description:
Important:
1. Include the share-secret from HTTP header 
2. Include uuid from the response of a successful file uploading, which is the file identifier

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: uuid, the file identifier, from previous successful uploading reponse

parameters.name: share-secret
parameters.description: share-secret from previous successful uploading response

parameters.name: thumbnail
parameters.description: The request will return thumbnail if the tag of “thumbnail: true” is explicitly put in the header

401.description: unauthorized [without token, token error, token expired]
unauthorized [without token, token error, token expired]

post.description:
Group settings:
1. Group name
2. Group description
3. Public vs. Private Group
4. Max number of member (including admin)
5. If public group, allow join freely vs. require permission from admin
6. allowinvites property. If public group, then allowinvites is false. If private group, then allowinvites is true.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: "desc": group description. Note: Use key "desc".                                                                                                                                           public vs. private: group type.                                                                       maxusers: (Optional Attribute, default is 200). The max number of group members.                                     approval: (Optional Attribute, default is true). Does user need permission to join the group?                          owner: The owner (admin) of the group.                                                          members: (Optional Attribute) Group members. Ignore the attribute if no member to be added. The group owner does not represent as a group member.

401.description: unauthorized [without token, token error, token expired]
unauthorized [without token, token error, token expired]

404.description: The group ID cannot be found

put.description:
The message body only allows groupname, description, and maxusers.

Note: Use '+' to replace space if modifying groupname ​and description. E.g., use "test+group" instead of "test group".

Warning: If group cannot be found or operation failed, then the response will still return HTTP code 200, but key-value are "maxusers"=false, "groupname"=false, and "description"=false.

401.description: unauthorized [without token, token error, token expired]
unauthorized [without token, token error, token expired]

Blocked user will not able to see nor  receive group message.

get.description:
- Get messages based on hour
- We advise users to obtain message history an hour later, because generation of history files needs a certain time. For example, after 09:00 in 12/10/2016 users can download the messages from message history between 07:00-08:00 in 12/10/2016.
- The server acquiescently save historical documents for 3 days. If you need to extend the storage time, please contact busness.

400.description: Message history has expired or has not been generated

post.description:
Send a message to user(s) and group(s).               
Please refer to the Hyphenate docs for further details about message body. https://docs.hyphenate.io/docs/post-messages

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Message types: Text, image, audio message, video, command, etc. Please refer to the Hyphenate docs for further details about message body. https://docs.hyphenate.io/docs/post-messages

401.description: unauthorized [without token, token error, token expired]

post.description: All of the Hyphenate API endpoints requires authentication token for session, unless specified otherwise.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: client_id and client_secret can be found in the application details page of the Easemob console

400.description: usually an invalid value for client_id or client_secret

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Get specified number of user by setting the batch limit with parameter "limit". Otherwise the API returns the 10 most recent created users by default.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination: If the query results more objects than value of limit, then the response will carry an extra attribute “cursor”, the value points to the next page. There is No cursor on the last page or if the returning objects is less than batch limit value.

401.description: Unauthorized [without token, token error, or token expired]

post.description:
Register an IM user account respects to org and app keys. 
Note: There're 2 types of registration, 'open' and 'authorized'. 'open' registration does not require admin authentication, but 'authorized' does. See the application -> "overview" -> "User Registration Permission" in Hyphenate console. 
'Authorized' registration is recommended, which prevents malicious attempt to create junk user account from the ones obtained the URL.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: To create multiple users at once: [    {        "username": "user1",        "password": "123456"    },    {        "username": "user2",        "password": "123456"    }]

400.description: User(s) already exists. The username or password is empty or illegal

401.description: Unauthorized: missing token, token error, token expired

delete.description: Delete total number of N user accounts in batch. Recommend set N range 100~500 at a time to ensure the performance. Cannot specified user account in deletion, check the response to see which user accounts are deleted.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Total number of user accounts to be deleted

401.description: Unauthorized: missing token, token error, token expired

Only the app admin is allowed to access

500.description: Typically mysql error. Please address the issue to our support team if the problem persists.

get.description: get the current total size (in Bytes) of user metadata for this app

parameters.description: No authorization needed. Open to the public.
parameters.name: Authorization

403.description: Number of user names you are querying exceeds the batch limit, 100.

500.description: Typically mysql error. Please address the issue to our support team if the problem persists.

post.description: Get metadata key-value pairs for given users and properties. Will return empty data if the users/properties doesn't exist You can batch get for 100 users at most.

parameters.description: User level Bearer token. Only the same user or the app admin is authorized to delete metadata for the designated user.
parameters.name: Authorization

200.description: Success. Note that deleting metadata for a non-existing user will also succeed.

401.description: Only the same user or the app admin is authorized to delete metadata for the designated user.

500.description: Typically mysql error. Please address the issue to our support team if the problem persists.

delete.description: Delete metadata for the designated user. Deleting non-existing user is defined as success.

parameters.description: No authorization needed. Open to the public.
parameters.name: Authorization

500.description: Typically mysql error. Please address the issue to our support team if the problem persists.

get.description: Get all metadata key-value pairs for a single user. Will returns empty data if the user doesn't exist.

parameters.description: User level Bearer token. Only the same user or the app admin is authorized to set metadata for the designated user.
parameters.name: Authorization

200.description: Return the full content of this user's metadata after the successful modification.

401.description: Only the user himself or the app admin are allowed to modify metadata of the designated user. Also return 401 when a non-admin user is trying to PUT to a non-existing user because regular users are not authorized to know if a specific user exist or not.

403.description: Happens when you are trying to put data that exceeds the limit, either the user level limit (2KB in default) or the app level limit (10GB in default).

404.description: The user you are trying to set metadata for doesn't exist.

409.description: The user you are trying to change is already changed. We are using optimistic locking so when multiple threads are trying to change the same user at the same time only one of them will succeed and others will fail and get 409 conflict response.

500.description: Typically mysql error. Please address the issue to our support team if the problem persists.

put.description: Set metadata for the designated user. Only the user himself or the app admin is authorized to change metadata for an user. Content of metadata is plain string key-value pairs. The default limit of metadata size for a single user is 2KB. The default limit of total metadata size of all users in an app is 10GB.  Note that the key names listed here are just examples. You can set any plain text key-value pairs.

batchGetMetadataRequest.description: request body for batch getting metadata of multiple users

properties.description: Properties filter list. The query only returns those properties within this list. Those that are not included in the list will be ignored.

desc.example: update userMetadata failed, concurrent updates not allowed
user metadata length exceed the limit
